channel.title: First EVER 1 billion GP stake
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/ra2437.png[/img]
I had 2 HP left when he died :D
First day staking Profit: about 2.7B (cash and items)

item.title: First EVER 1 billion GP stake
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:35, topic:411313”][quote author=B2300 T4nk link=topic=512578.msg3721390#msg3721390 date=1313959402]

[quote author=Phaze One link=topic=512578.msg3720689#msg3720689 date=1313911344]

[quote author=B2300 T4nk link=topic=512578.msg3720456#msg3720456 date=1313896985]

Thanks guys I lost a 200m stake so I quit for the reset of the day
[/quote]1b-200m=800m. That’s still a lot of money.

You’re telling me, I don’t know what to buy
[/quote]AGS+Claws+Bandos= Time to go PWN some newbs

You’ve obviously never been pking.
[/quote]I’m old school

have u ever used a dds spec? D mace spec? Dharok set?[/quote]
Good days… those weapons… too bad ive never used the d mace spec lol never done the heroes quest dont plan on doing it soon.
I remember when i got my first 100k no lifing cows… i was so proud of myself… went out and bought full addy and rune 2h/scim

And because of my rune stuff noobs (much like myself) would beg for money

And i think i bought dharok once… then because my str was like 71 or something i thought omfg so low hits (I didnt even know how to use the armor effect… i thought it was a spec attack at first.

Read full topic

item.title: First EVER 1 billion GP stake
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I remember when Dh was the best armour in-game in most ways for melee’s lol.
I trololol whenever I go wildi and see someone dh with obby shield its like use a defender or are you gonna be a def narb trying to luck?
The original reason I assume people used obby shields was cause maybe the defender would make the opponent eat cause the defender may make the whip/d scim hit more (shield=49 hp defender 46hp so they eat) but now I just think phail pkaaa’s

Read full topic
